recommendations.summary: The system shows no immediate security issues or compliance flags, but lacks data quality and cost trend metrics.

recommendations.title: Implement GDPR/CCPA Compliance Audits
recommendations.description: Conduct regular audits to ensure that all data handling practices are compliant with GDPR and CCPA regulations, even in the absence of current flags.
action_items: Schedule quarterly compliance audits with a focus on data handling practices.
Review and update privacy policies to ensure they reflect current practices.

recommendations.title: Establish Continuous Security Monitoring
recommendations.description: While no security issues have been detected, it's essential to implement continuous monitoring to proactively identify vulnerabilities.
action_items: Deploy a security information and event management (SIEM) system.
Regularly review security logs and alerts for anomalies.

recommendations.title: Analyze Cost Trends for Optimization
recommendations.description: Since cost trends are currently unavailable, implement a tracking system to monitor job costs and identify areas for optimization.
action_items: Integrate cost tracking tools to analyze job execution expenses.
Review and optimize resource allocation based on job performance and cost.

recommendations.title: Enhance Data Quality Monitoring
recommendations.description: Establish a framework for monitoring and improving data quality, as the current metrics indicate a lack of data quality assessment.
action_items: Implement data validation checks and quality assessments for all incoming data.
Create a data governance team to oversee data quality initiatives.

recommendations.title: Define and Monitor SLOs
recommendations.description: Develop and implement Service Level Objectives (SLOs) to ensure operational excellence and adherence to performance standards.
action_items: Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to service delivery.
Regularly review SLO performance and adjust as necessary.

alerts.message: No security issues detected, but continuous monitoring is recommended.
Lack of data quality metrics may indicate potential governance issues.
Cost trends are not being tracked; consider implementing cost monitoring tools.
SLOs are not defined; establish performance metrics to ensure operational excellence.
